Name: Great Pyramid of Giza
Notes: Due to erosion today it stands at the height of 138.8 metres (455 ft).

Name: Lincoln Cathedral
Notes: Spire collapsed in 1549; today, stands at a height of 83 metres (272 ft).

Name: St. Mary's Church
Notes: Spire destroyed by lightning in 1647; today stands at a height of 104 metres (341 ft).

Name: St Nikolai
Notes: Due to aerial bombing in World War II the nave was demolished; only the spire remains.

Name: Eiffel Tower
Notes: Currently stands at a height of 324 metres (1,063 ft).
